titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Michael Sadleir Letters, 1956-1957 M0012

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2009-08-04T09:36-0700

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

scopecontent.head: SCOPE AND CONTENT
scopecontent.p: Summary: Letters written to Anthony Newnham relating to the purchase of books in the field of Victorian literature. Includes Sadleir's obituary.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Michael Sadleir Letters, M0012, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights:
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.
